recipe_text: Quantity; 340; Prepare 340 grams of rotini pasta| Measurement; 450; Measure out 450 grams of cooked chicken, shredded| Measurement; 100; Measure out 100 grams of celery, chopped| Measurement; 100; Measure out 100 grams of carrots, shredded| Measurement; 100; Measure out 100 grams of blue cheese, crumbled| Measurement; 120; Measure out 120 grams of mayonnaise| Measurement; 60; Measure out 60 grams of hot sauce| Measurement; 60; Measure out 60 grams of milk| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of salt| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of black pepper| Untimed; None; Cook rotini pasta according to package instructions| Untimed; None; Drain pasta and rinse under cold water| Untimed; None; In a large bowl, combine pasta, chicken, celery, carrots, and blue cheese| Untimed; None; In a small bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, hot sauce, milk, salt, and black pepper| Untimed; None; Pour the dressing over the pasta mixture and toss to coat| Timed; 600; Refrigerate for 10 minutes to allow flavors to blend| Finish; None; Serve chilled!
title: Buffalo Chicken Pasta Salad
